name: kib_plastic
summary: My second theme for Python editing.
description:
A new theme, relaxing with pale color scheme.

I was not aware that Dmitry Vasiliev wrote an additional python syntax file for Vim, the next versions of the theme will try to use it.

Once again, a the script and a screenshot can be seen here :
http://kib2.free.fr/documents/Vim/

Don't forget to rate it, please.
install_details: Put this file into your Vim's "colors" directory.
